title: Romeo Beckham looks just like dad David in smouldering unseen modelling photos
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Romeo Beckham looks just like his footballer dad in a new modelling picture he shared on his Instagram .

The handsome teen has been modelling since he was 13, when he appeared as the face of fashion giant Burberry.

He has now shared two photos from an unseen shoot where he was also photographed with older brother Brooklyn .

Romeo, 17, can be seen in a plain black t shirt with edgy gold rings, small hoop earring and a chain around his neck.

His hair is messy and oiled as he stares into the camera holding his hand up to his face, with the caption: "Hurry back to LA for more".

In the photo with his big brother, Brooklyn wraps his arms protectively around Romeo, his array of tattoos on show.

The photographer Damon Baker hinted that he and the Beckham boys bonded on their shoot, commenting: "This was such a fun day".

Romeo's parents Victoria and David reportedly skipped his 17th birthday last month, and left it in the hands of nannies to arrange.

Romeo had his siblings with him as they enjoyed a pizza party at a swanky joint but his parents were absent from the celebrations.

The birthday boy had 20-year-old brother Brooklyn and 14-year-old Cruz to support him, along with eight-year-old sister Harper.

Meanwhile David and Victoria's roles were fulfilled by four nannies that accompanied their offspring on the party date, it is reported.

It was reportedly left to Harper to present her brother with the cake.

Meanwhile Brooklyn's tumultuous relationship with model Hana Cross continues.

Hana, 22, broke down in tears after crossing paths with the eldest of the Beckham kids at a London Fashion Week party, and has now made a move to remove him from her life.

(Image: Dave Benett/Getty Images)

The pair played out their relationship on social media having been an item for months, but unfollowed each other on Instagram when they split.

Although it looked like they may have worked things out when she followed him back again last Thursday and liked a photo of him.

But at an Agent Provocateur party at Annabel's members club in London, the couple had a row which left Hana running to the bathroom in tears.
description: Romeo posted black and white photos from an edgy shoot with his older brother Brooklyn
